org.xchain.framework.quartz

Class JobThreadContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.lifecycle.ThreadContext
      • org.xchain.framework.quartz.JobThreadContext

  • public class JobThreadContext
extends org.xchain.framework.lifecycle.ThreadContext

    The thread context object for commands being executed by quartz.

    Author:
    Christian Trimble

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      JobThreadContext(org.quartz.JobExecutionContext jobExecutionContext)
      Constructs a new JobThreadContext for the specified JobExecutionContext.

    • Method Summary

      org.quartz.JobExecutionContext getJobExecutionContext()
